spiritsExplanation:
The workout video 'Pilates Reformer Workout | 30 min | Full Body' by Dez Fit exhibits strong elements of both 'Flow & Rhythm' and 'Structured & Disciplined' spirits.

The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is highly evident (score: 0.9) due to the nature of Pilates workouts, which involve smooth, continuous movements that emphasize control, rhythm, and a mind-body connection. Comments highlighting the challenging, yet smooth nature of the workout without unnecessary noise ('no unnecessary talking just sweaty workout') further support this classification.

The 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit (score: 0.8) is also prominent, with the workout focusing on full-body conditioning and specific upper body emphasis. The structured guidance by a certified Pilates instructor indicates a disciplined approach, with cues and modifications to help viewers execute exercises correctly, as reflected in the channel's description and user comments praising the style and instruction ('I've been doing your reformer workouts...your style, pace & instruction').

Overall, the lack of intense, high-energy language in the description and comments excludes 'High-Energy & Intense', while the indoor, equipment-based nature precludes 'Outdoor & Adventure'.
